_README.description: Model metadata for local/self-hosted OpenAI-compatible endpoints (Custom provider).
_README.usage: Each entry will be advertised by Custom provider. Aliases are case-insensitive.

field_descriptions.aliases: Array of short names users can type instead of full model name
field_descriptions.context_window: Total number of tokens model can process (input + output combined)
field_descriptions.max_output_tokens: Maximum number of tokens model can generate in a single response
field_descriptions.supports_extended_thinking: Whether model supports extended reasoning tokens
field_descriptions.supports_json_mode: Whether model can guarantee valid JSON output
field_descriptions.supports_images: Whether model can process images/visual input
field_descriptions.max_image_size_mb: Maximum total size in MB for all images combined (capped at 40MB max for custom models)
field_descriptions.supports_temperature: Whether model accepts temperature parameter in API calls (set to false for O3/O4 reasoning models)
field_descriptions.temperature_constraint: Type of temperature constraint: 'fixed' (fixed value), 'range' (continuous range), 'discrete' (specific values), or omit for default range
field_descriptions.intelligence_score: 1-20 human rating used as primary signal for auto-mode model ordering

models.description: Zhipu AI GLM-4.7 model - High-performance Chinese/English language model with large context window and function calling support
